Rulings.HAT:
This effect applies for the entire turn (it does not stop applying during the End Phase).
If this effect has resolved: 
● That monster's effects on the field are negated even if it leaves the field (EG, it can negate "Lonefire Blossom").
● If that monster is later flipped face-down, its effects are no longer negated.
Only effects which activate/apply on the field are negated.
● EG, "Cardcard D" and "Exiled Force" will be negated. 
● EG, "Mystic Tomato" or "Reborn Tengu" will not be negated.

The ② is a card effect, but not a card's activation. 
● You can activate it as a Spell Speed 2 effect.
● It can't be negated by "Dark Bribe" or "Naturia Barkion".

PSCT.Base: Target 1 face-up Effect Monster your opponent controls; that face-up monster your opponent controls has its effects negated until the end of this turn. During your turn, except the turn this card was sent to the Graveyard: You can banish this card from your Graveyard, then target 1 face-up Effect Monster your opponent controls; that target has its effects negated until the end of this turn.
